markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Flurry of Maneuvers](/Feats.aspx?ID=444) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 160 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

</column>

---

You flurry is a combination of maneuvers. You can replace one or both of your attacks during a Flurry of Blows with Grapples, Shoves, or Trips.
name: Flurry of Maneuvers
